claims.object: Techniques that create double-stranded breaks and take advantage of cells' natural homologous recombination repair systems

surface_layer.definition: Techniques used to insert genes at specific locations in the genome.

deep_layer.mechanism: Double-stranded breaks are introduced, and the cell's homologous recombination repair system is utilized to insert the desired gene.
deep_layer.origin: Developed to improve the precision of genetic modification.
